record.title: NAVAL VESSEL TRANSFER ACT OF 2008
record.narrative:
NAVAL VESSEL TRANSFER ACT OF 2008 -- (Senate - October 01, 2008)

[Page: S10396]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of H.R. 7177 which is at the desk.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 7177) to authorize the transfer of naval vessels to certain foreign recipients, and for other purposes.
There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the bill.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the bill be read three times and passed, the motions to reconsider be laid upon the table with no intervening action or debate, and that any statements relating to this measure be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The bill (H.R. 7177) was ordered to a third reading, read the third time, and passed.
